document_data.name: Sacred Strike
document_data.mainbody: '''''Sacred strike''''' was a [[divine]] [[necromancy]] spell that created a [[whip]]-like lash of [[force]] energy within the hand of the caster.
document_data.Effects:
The lash appeared as chain of twinkling, purple motes of light. 

When wielded by the casting [[cleric]] the lash possessed the properties of an [[Item enchantment|enchanted]] weapon. When it struck a living being it inflicted great pain upon them and healed the wielder. It was not very effective when used against the [[undead]].
document_data.Components: In addition to [[Verbal component|verbal]] and [[somatic component]]s, ''sacred strike'' required the [[material component]]s of a single hair taken from the caster and two drops of ''[[unholy water]]''.
